alert.note: Alert for Grant; La Salle (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 5:25PM CDT until October 12 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... West central La Salle Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Timber Trails, or near Alexandria International Airport, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ball, Pollock, Fishville, Rogers and Bentley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
